mapper.select: select id, star, text, img_path, order_id, create_time, anonymity, reply, client_name from HMS.remark where id = #{id}
select id, star, text, img_path, order_id, create_time, anonymity, reply, client_name from HMS.remark limit #{page}, #{count}
select id, star, text, img_path, order_id, create_time, anonymity, reply, client_name from HMS.remark where star>3.5 limit #{page}, #{count}
select id, star, text, img_path, order_id, create_time, anonymity, reply, client_name from HMS.remark where 3.5 >= star limit #{page}, #{count}
mapper.insert: insert into HMS.remark(star, text, img_path, order_id, create_time, anonymity, reply, client_name) values (#{star}, #{text}, #{imgPath}, #{orderId}, #{createTime}, #{anonymity}, #{reply}, #{clientName})
mapper.update:
update HMS.remark
star = #{star},
text = #{text},
img_path = #{imgPath},
order_id = #{orderId},
create_time = #{createTime},
anonymity = #{anonymity},
reply = #{reply},
client_name = #{clientName},
where id = #{id}
